Package it.polimi.ingsw.networking.utility

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Pingable
    Interface used to make a ServerSocketConnectionHandler Ping methods compliant, in order to ping client connections.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommunicationMessage.Message
    Private class used to create json messages
    ConnectionTypeTest
    Tests for the ConnectionType enum's parse(String) method
    Ping
    Class that manages the connectivity state of a connection.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CommunicationMessage
    Messages sent through the network
    ConnectionState
    Enum representing in which states the connection can be
    ConnectionType
    An helper enum used when handling two different connections.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalPortNumber
    This exception is thrown if there's an attempt to create a connection with an unexpected port number like the ones reserved (0-1024) or the ones invalid over 16-bit (65535+)
